## GET [/brapi/v1/traits]

```{r}
library(brapi)

# make sure brapiTS::mock_server() is running in a separate process

con <- ba_connect() 

json <- ba_traits(con, rclass = "json")

```
### Response

Code: 200 (application/json)

```json
`r json`
```
